DialogueNode.npc_text: “Without the captain and pilot, I’m afraid we still have one problem to solve. You are a resourceful person, Miss Callahan – you wouldn’t happen to be also familiar with piloting the airship?”
DialogueNode.speaker: Sebastian

DialogueNode.npc_text: “I got some basic training, in case of emergency. Never actually tried in a real situation before, so I guess we’ll find out soon enough.”
DialogueNode.speaker: Dusty
